Utilities.ping: Shows the current ping of the bot to reach your client. Higher = slower
Utilities.help (command): Shows the help page for (command). Blank if all.
Utilities.cgloves {username}: Shows the glove data for {username} which displays what gloves they own.

Moderation.purge {amount}: Clears {amount} of messages in the channel.
Moderation.ban {member} (duration) (reason): Bans a member for (duration). Duration is infinite if left blank. (Reason) is left None if blank.

Information.info: Shows the info of the bot.
Information.serverinfo: Shows the info of the server
Information.userinfo (user): Shows the info of (user). Author if None.
Information.avatar (user): Shows the avatar of (user). Author if None.

Fun.fact (num): Tells you (num) facts! Max = 30 per time.
